content: weave in the ends and cut excess it may be helpful to practice a lazy daisy before beginning 4 of 5 dahlia drawstring bags | knitting pattern | © woolbird & joann stores f i n i s h i n g & c a r e use a yarn needle to weave in any remaining ends and trim excess gently block using warm water always hand wash knitted items avoiding scrubbing or agitating leave to soak and relax the fibers squeeze out the excess water take care to not to wring or twist lay flat on a towel and roll the towel up to remove more water lay flat to air dry straightening and smoothing out to the listed measurements enjoy 5 of 5 dahlia drawstring bags | knitting pattern | © woolbird & joann stores
